paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information specifically for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

individual_records.evidence_sentence: BRCA2 (p.Val220fs) was identified in women affected by breast cancer.

functional_data.summary: The variant is a frameshift mutation leading to a premature stop codon.

variants.segregation_data: Yes, it segregates with disease in families.
variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical correlation.
variants.additional_notes: This variant was one of the pathogenic variants identified in the study.
key_quotes: BRCA2 (p.Val220fs) was identified in women affected by breast cancer.
